<h1 align="center">How To Compile SEE Into A Windows DLL</h1>
<nowiki>
<ol>
<li><p>
Create an appropriate SEE source file by appending on of the SEE
source files (see.c, see-aes128-ofb.c, see-aes256-ofb.c,
see-aes128-ccm.c, or see-rc4.c) onto the end of an standard
"sqlite3.c" SQLite amalgamation.  Call the result "see-sqlite3.c".

<li><p>
Run the following MSVC command:
<verbatim>
cl.exe -DSQLITE_HAS_CODEC -DSQLITE_DLL -DSQLITE_API=_declspec(dllexport) -link -dll -out:sqlite3.dll
</verbatim>

<li><p>
To activate the encryption features of this DLL, you must run the following
pragma after opening each database file:
<verbatim>
PRAGMA activate_extensions('see-7bb07b8d471d642e');
</verbatim>
</ol>
